        At Kaisu Supply Chain, we understand that reliable transportation is the backbone of your business. As a dedicated trucking company, we specialize in delivering freight solutions that keep your operations running smoothly and your customers satisfied.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Officer

Job Location: Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Logistics / Trucking (Chinese-owned company)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Kaisu Supply Chain is seeking a proactive and experienced HR Officer to manage recruitment and basic HR operations, with a strong focus on hiring truck drivers.


Key Responsibilities


	Recruit, screen, and onboard truck drivers
	Coordinate driver documentation and records
	Manage employee files and HR documentation
	Liaise with operations team on manpower needs
	Handle basic HR administrative duties
	Ensure compliance with company policies.


Requirements


	Previous experience in HR or recruitment (truck driver recruitment is an advantage)
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Basic computer literacy (MS Word, Excel, etc.)
	Ability to work independently and meet recruitment targets
	Applicants who live close to the job location will be preferred
	Applicants must be ready to
	resume immediately.


Salary


	N150,000 monthly.
	Work Schedule: 6 days a week
	Accommodation: Provided


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: aishakschr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Accountant Job at Royal Hospital




        
    

        
        Royal Hospital, a National Health Insurance Scheme accredited health care provider and one of the first ever private hospitals located in Enugu requires for immediate employment the following:

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:  ACCOUNTANT
Job Location:  ENUGU

Candidate must possess the following:


	Minimum of HND in Accounting or related discipline.
	Must be computer literate
	Must be proficient in typing and EMR
	Must have good communication and interpersonal skills
	Previous experience in accounting position is an added advantage.
	Must be resident in Enugu.


Responsibilities and Attributes
     

            
    




	Assisting with administrative tasks
	Billing of patients and  final production of patient bill of charges
	Maintain high level of professionalism and competence in every client interaction.
	Account reconciliation, as well as Debt recovery especially from HMOs and other partners
	Make frequent calls and visits to strengthen client as well as partner relationships.
	 Analyze and resolve billing issues promptly.
	Inform management about complex client issues and resolutions, with regards to billing.
	Maintain client focused working environment for team.
	 Work in compliance with company policies and procedures.
	Identify and develop new business opportunities with partners.
	Utilize effective problem solving and time management skills in client service operations.
	 Assist in risk assessment and mitigation activities.
	Develop process improvements to enhance service efficiency and effectiveness.


REMUNERATION FOR ALL POSITIONS: Very attractive, highly competitive and negotiable.

Method of Application

Interested candidates should send their applications with a detailed resume and two verifiable guarantors, attaching all credentials and Birth Certificates or Statutory Declaration of Age to: info@royalhospital.com

NOTE: Applicants must reside in Enugu. Short listed candidates will be invited for interview. All applications must be received on or before Friday, 30th January, 2026.

	Adaptable to rapidly changing technology and business requirements.
